message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I appreciate the offer, but $180 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable spending. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160.
I'm still not quite there.  $160 is closer, but I'm only willing to go as high as $150. Let's see if we can make this work.
